name: Terraform (itch) (JingunSnack)
description:
Control:

  • WASD: Move
  • Space: Hold and Release to terraform!

How to Play:

  • Move around and cover all the blocks with green colors!
  • If a block gets painted 3 times, the block becomes larger and gives you a score
  • However, it has side effects that make you slower when you pass through and also it enables enemies (red balls) to destroy the block! 
  • If you cover all the blocks green, the game finishes. (Score = the number of green blocks)

Source Code:

  • https://github.com/JingunSnack/terraform
